mapper.sql:
A.ID AS A_ID, /** ID **/ A.CODE AS A_CODE, /** 组织编码 **/ A.NAME AS A_NAME, /** 组织名称 **/ A.PINYIN AS A_PINYIN, /** 拼音 **/ A.UNIFIED_CODE AS A_UNIFIED_CODE, /** 组织标杆编码 **/ A.LEADER AS A_LEADER, /** 组织负责人 **/ A.PRINCIPAL_NO AS A_PRINCIPAL_NO, /** 组织负责人工号 **/ A.PARENT_ORG_NAME AS A_PARENT_ORG_NAME, /** 上级组织名称 **/ A.PARENT_ORG_UNIFIED_CODE AS A_PARENT_ORG_UNIFIED_CODE, /** 上级组织标杆编码 **/ A.SUBSIDIARY_CODE AS A_SUBSIDIARY_CODE, /** 所属子公司编码 **/ A.COST_CENTER_CODE AS A_COST_CENTER_CODE, /** 所属成本中心编码 **/ A.STATUS AS A_STATUS, /** 组织状态 **/ A.END_TIME AS A_END_TIME, /** 作废日期 **/ A.BEGIN_TIME AS A_BEGIN_TIME, /** 启用日期 **/ A.DIVISION AS A_DIVISION, /** 是否事业部 **/ A.DIVISION_CODE AS A_DIVISION_CODE, /** 事业部编码 **/ A.BIG_REGION AS A_BIG_REGION, /** 是否大区 **/ A.SMALL_REGION AS A_SMALL_REGION, /** 是否小区 **/ A.EXPRESS_SALES_DEPARTMENT AS EXPRESS_SALES_DEPARTMENT, /** 是否快递虚拟营业部 **/ A.EXPRESS_BIG_REGION AS EXPRESS_BIG_REGION ,/** 是否快递大区 **/ A.EXPRESS_PART AS EXPRESS_PART ,/** 是否快递点部 **/ A.ADDRESS AS A_ADDRESS, /** 部门地址 **/ A.DEPT_AREA AS A_DEPT_AREA, /** 部门面积 **/ A.PROV_CODE AS A_PROV_CODE, /** 省份 **/ A.CITY_CODE AS A_CITY_CODE, /** 城市 **/ A.COUNTY_CODE AS A_COUNTY_CODE, /** 区县 **/ A.SALES_DEPARTMENT AS A_SALES_DEPARTMENT, /** 是否营业部派送部 **/ A.TRANSFER_CENTER AS A_TRANSFER_CENTER, /** 是否外场 **/ A.DO_AIR_DISPATCH AS A_DO_AIR_DISPATCH, /** 是否可空运配载 **/ A.TRANS_DEPARTMENT AS A_TRANS_DEPARTMENT, /** 是否车队 **/ A.DISPATCH_TEAM AS A_DISPATCH_TEAM, /** 是否车队调度组 **/ A.BILLING_GROUP AS A_BILLING_GROUP, /** 是否集中开单组 **/ A.TRANS_TEAM AS A_TRANS_TEAM, /** 是否车队组 **/ A.IS_DELIVER_SCHEDULE AS A_IS_DELIVER_SCHEDULE, /** 是否派送排单 **/ A.IS_ARRANGE_GOODS AS A_IS_ARRANGE_GOODS, /** 是否理货 **/ A.DELIVER_OUTFIELD AS A_DELIVER_OUTFIELD, /** 派送排单服务外场 **/ A.ARRANGE_OUTFIELD AS A_ARRANGE_OUTFIELD, /** 理货部门服务外场 **/ A.ARRANGE_BIZ_TYPE AS A_ARRANGE_BIZ_TYPE, /** 理货业务类型 **/ A.CREATE_TIME AS A_CREATE_TIME, /** 创建时间 **/ A.MODIFY_TIME AS A_MODIFY_TIME, /** 更新时间 **/ A.ACTIVE AS A_ACTIVE, /** 是否启用 **/ A.CREATE_USER_CODE AS A_CREATE_USER_CODE, /** 创建人 **/ A.MODIFY_USER_CODE AS A_MODIFY_USER_CODE, /** 更新人 **/ A.AIR_DISPATCH AS A_AIR_DISPATCH, /** 是否空运总调 **/ A.ENTITY_FINANCE AS A_ENTITY_FINANCE, /** 所属实体财务部 **/ A.DEP_COORDINATE AS A_DEP_COORDINATE, /** 部门服务区坐标编号 **/ A.DEP_TELEPHONE AS A_DEP_TELEPHONE, /** 部门电话 **/ A.DEP_FAX AS A_DEP_FAX, /** 部门传真 **/ A.ORG_SIMPLE_NAME AS A_ORG_SIMPLE_NAME, /** 部门简称 **/
B.ID AS B_ID, /** ID **/ B.EMP_NAME AS B_EMP_NAME, /** 职员姓名 **/ B.PINYIN AS B_PINYIN, /** 拼音 **/ B.EMP_CODE AS B_EMP_CODE, /** 工号 **/ B.GENDER AS B_GENDER, /** 性别 **/ B.UNIFIELD_CODE AS B_UNIFIELD_CODE, /** 部门标杆编码 **/ B.TITLE AS B_TITLE, /** 职位 **/ B.DEGREE AS B_DEGREE, /** 职等 **/ B.BIRTHDATE AS B_BIRTHDATE, /** 出生日期 **/ B.STATUS AS B_STATUS, /** 状态 **/ B.PHONE AS B_PHONE, /** 电话 **/ B.IDENTITY_CARD AS B_IDENTITY_CARD, /** 身份证号 **/ B.ENTRY_DATE AS B_ENTRY_DATE, /** 入职日期 **/ B.LEAVE_DATE AS B_LEAVE_DATE, /** 离职日期 **/ B.MOBILE_PHONE AS B_MOBILE_PHONE, /** 手机号码 **/ B.EMAIL AS B_EMAIL, /** 电子邮箱 **/ B.CREATE_TIME AS B_CREATE_TIME, /** 创建时间 **/ B.MODIFY_TIME AS B_MODIFY_TIME, /** 更新时间 **/ B.ACTIVE AS B_ACTIVE, /** 是否启用 **/ B.CREATE_USER_CODE AS B_CREATE_USER_CODE, /** 创建人 **/ B.MODIFY_USER_CODE AS B_MODIFY_USER_CODE /** 更新人 **/
mapper.select:
SELECT /** 综合:根据实体动态条件精确查询,如果属性的值为null或者空白则无效 **/
FROM BSE.T_BAS_ORG A, BSE.T_BAS_EMPLOYEE B
AND A.UNIFIED_CODE = B.UNIFIELD_CODE

SELECT/** 综合:根据实体动态条件精确查询总数,如果属性的值为null或者空白则无效 **/ count(*) FROM BSE.T_BAS_ORG A , BSE.T_BAS_EMPLOYEE B
AND A.UNIFIED_CODE = B.UNIFIELD_CODE
mapper.sql:
AND A.ID like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.PINYIN like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.UNIFIED_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.unifiedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.LEADER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.PRINCIPAL_NO like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.principalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.PARENT_ORG_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.parentOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.PARENT_ORG_UNIFIED_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.parentOrgUnifiedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.SUBSIDIARY_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.subsidiaryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.COST_CENTER_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.costCenterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.STATUS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.END_TIME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}), '%')
AND A.BEGIN_TIME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}), '%')
AND A.DIVISION like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.division,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.DIVISION_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.divisionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.BIG_REGION like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.bigRegion,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.SMALL_REGION like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.smallRegion,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.ADDRESS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.DEPT_AREA like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.deptArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.PROV_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.CITY_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.COUNTY_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.SALES_DEPARTMENT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.salesDepartment,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.TRANSFER_CENTER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.transferCenter,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.DO_AIR_DISPATCH like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.doAirDispatch,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.TRANS_DEPARTMENT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.transDepartment,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.DISPATCH_TEAM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.dispatchTeam,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.BILLING_GROUP like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.billingGroup,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.TRANS_TEAM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.transTeam,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.IS_DELIVER_SCHEDULE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.isDeliverSchedule,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.IS_ARRANGE_GOODS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.isArrangeGoods,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.DELIVER_OUTFIELD like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.deliverOutfield,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.ARRANGE_OUTFIELD like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.arrangeOutfield,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.ARRANGE_BIZ_TYPE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.arrangeBizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.AIR_DISPATCH like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.airDispatch,jdbcType=CHAR}), '%')
AND A.ENTITY_FINANCE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.entityFinance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.DEP_COORDINATE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.depCoordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.DEP_TELEPHONE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.depTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.DEP_FAX like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.depFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.ORG_SIMPLE_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orgAdministrativeInfo.orgSimpleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.ID like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.EMP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.PINYIN like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.EMP_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.empCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.GENDER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.UNIFIELD_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.unifieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.TITLE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.DEGREE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.BIRTHDATE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}), '%')
AND B.STATUS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.PHONE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.IDENTITY_CARD like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.ENTRY_DATE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.entryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}), '%')
AND B.LEAVE_DATE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.leaveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}), '%')
AND B.MOBILE_PHONE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND B.EMAIL like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employee.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND A.ACTIVE= #{conditionActive,jdbcType=CHAR} AND B.ACTIVE = #{conditionActive,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT /** 综合:根据实体动态条件模糊查询,如果属性的值为null或者空白则无效 **/
FROM BSE.T_BAS_ORG A , BSE.T_BAS_EMPLOYEE B
AND A.UNIFIED_CODE = B.UNIFIELD_CODE

SELECT/** 综合:根据实体动态条件模糊查询总数,如果属性的值为null或者空白则无效 **/ count(*) FROM BSE.T_BAS_ORG A , BSE.T_BAS_EMPLOYEE B
AND A.UNIFIED_CODE = B.UNIFIELD_CODE
